description: {DThis room is...  Hard to describe.  A large assortment of things
sit around the room, each seeming to invite you to enter...  But you
had best hope you don't choose wrong.  There is no indicator which is
which, and they seem to shimmer and change on occasion.  {x
30881.name: {bA{Bb{Ystra{Bc{bt{x - {gS{Gt{Wran{Gg{ge{x {bD{Bo{Wo{Br{bs{x

description: The clouds of the west are white and fluffy, but become darker
here.  The sunlight is no longer seen from here, only the glowing face
of the moon.  Visions of children being beaten and pillaged villages
are rampant, cries of pain and moans of pleasure intermingle through
the air.  To the west the shimmering pathway crossroads, to the east
the dark clouds continue on.
30805.name: {DThe {rD{Rr{We{Dam{Wi{Rn{rg{x - {DPath to a {wF{Wl{Da{rshb{Da{Wc{wk{x

description: You are in the middle of a field.  The skies are light blue, and
white clouds float lightly throughout them.  Beneath your feet is
dirt, plowed nicely and in some places seeds lay.  Not far off you can
see a farmer, hunched over, sowing seeds.  To the west the fields
travel off towards a farmhouse.
30852.name: {wF{Wl{8a{rshb{8a{Wc{wk{x - Through the Fields

description: A path of worn dirt travels east/west through the forest here.  On
the north and south sides of the trail the forest grows full of life.
To the west the dirt path continues on for a while, but it also
disappears off to the southwest into a patch of clouds.
30837.name: {mF{Ma{Rnta{Ms{my{x - Floating in a Dream

description: The cobblestone street to the west turns into a smaller road
leading east towards a small tavern.  It seems a nice place, the
windows are lightly tinted but the blazing fireplace within still
shines through brightly.  To the east the street leads up to the door
of the tavern.
30855.name: {wF{Wl{8a{rshb{8a{Wc{wk{x - Before a Tavern

description: You are floating in mid-air.  A small rat hovers here, wondering
why his tail is missing.  To the west piles of gold and jewels glitter
in the light, while to the east a large stony cliff stands mightily.
Its eyes flutter lightly.
30873.name: {bA{Bb{Ystra{Bc{bt{9 -{8 Floating in a Dream

description: The lush trees sway to the north and south, the gentle breeze cools
the skin as the bright and cheery sunlight streams through the tree
branches overhead.  Small critters scamper about, gathering food in
the underbrush.  The dirt trail continues east and west.
30819.name: {mF{Ma{Rnta{Ms{my{x - Floating in a Dream

description: A long hallway stretches east/west, lit by torches and lines with
paintings of famous warriors throughout the realms.  The paintings
depict great battles won and lost, and of great warriors who gave
their lives for the people.  To the west the hallway ends not far off,
with a large table in the center of it, to the east the hallway goes
to the forest trail.
30825.name: {mF{Ma{Rnta{Ms{my{x - Dreams of Fame

description: Dark clouds of confusion surround you as a bird flies backwards
underneath you.  All seems wierd until you notice that, you're upside
down.  Somehow the pathway of intertwined hands and feet is now upside
down.  The pink fluffy bunny can be seen following you from the south
with knife in hand.  A large portal of swirling milk stands to the
north, a few rocks seem to be floating in it.  To the south the trail
of hands and feet flips back over.
30810.name: {DThe {rD{Rr{We{Dam{Wi{Rn{rg{x - {bA{Bb{Ystra{Bc{bt{x Entrance

description: The hallway is filled with flittering silk sheets and colored
candles giving off scents of love and spices.  To the west a large
room with a giant bed can be seen, while to the east a dirt trail
leading off to the forest lies.
30833.name: {mF{Ma{Rnta{Ms{my{x - Dreams of Lust

description: You are floating in mid-air above a sea of churning shadows.
Bunnies flutter by on gossamer wings while the sky overhead melts and
drips a muckly purple substance.  To the south a large stone cliff
juts up, its face as sheer as a pancake.  To the north the air
continues to float.
30871.name: {bA{Bb{Ystra{Bc{bt{9 -{8 Sea of Shadows

description: Clouds travel overhead and below you as the pathway of shimmering
light crosses.  Paths leading in all four directions are labeled by
bright signs.  To the {mwest{9 lays the lands of {mF{Ma{Rnta{Ms{my{9, a place where
the young and joyful play.  While to the {Meast{9 is the world of
{wF{Wl{8a{rshba{8c{Wk{ws{9 can be seen, where the unafraid go to fight their pasts.
Strangled in dark clouds to the {Rnorth{9 is the {bA{Bb{Ystra{Bc{bt{9 realm, where
even the gods have been known to tremble.  The shimmering pathway to
reality travels back to the {rsouth{9.
30804.name: {DThe {rD{Rr{We{Dam{Wi{Rn{rg{x - {DCrossroads of {DN{bi{Bg{bh{Dt{x

description: The dirt path curves from north to east around the trees, but two
paths fork off to the west and south.  To the west a hallway filled
with flowing silks and velvetty carpets travels, while to the south
the hallway to an ordinary household lays.
30830.name: {mF{Ma{Rnta{Ms{my{x - Dreams of Lust and Love

description: {DThis is a massive throne, shifting forms every few seconds into
something entirely different.  It still retains throne-like qualities,
however.  Around it are several lesser thrones, each for one of the
creatures in the area...  {x
30889.name: {bA{Bb{Ystra{Bc{bt{x - {DThrone of Insanity{x

description: {DThis room is...  Hard to describe.  A large assortment of things
sit around the room, each seeming to invite you to enter...  But you
had best hope you don't choose wrong.  There is no indicator which is
which, and they seem to shimmer and change on occasion.  {x
30884.name: {bA{Bb{Ystra{Bc{bt{x - {gS{Gt{Wran{Gg{ge{x {bD{Bo{Wo{Br{bs{x

description: The wide streets continue to the east and west, all seems bland and
wet other than a small house to the northwest that glows with vibrant
colors.  To the northeast a large alleyway starts between two large
and ominous buildings.
30857.name: {wF{Wl{8a{rshb{8a{Wc{wk{x - Cobblestone Streets

description: {DIt appears you took the wrong path.  Such a shame.  Oh, well.
Looks like you get to walk back and try again!  Hopefully none of
those strange beasts that were on the path have returned...  {x
30886.name: {bA{Bb{Ystra{Bc{bt{x - {rO{Ro{Wpsi{Re{rs{x

description: {DThis room is...  Hard to describe.  A large assortment of things
sit around the room, each seeming to invite you to enter...  But you
had best hope you don't choose wrong.  There is no indicator which is
which, and they seem to shimmer and change on occasion.  {x
30885.name: {bA{Bb{Ystra{Bc{bt{x - {gS{Gt{Wran{Gg{ge{x {bD{Bo{Wo{Br{bs{x

description: The trail widens here, and a small pond is off to the west with a
few ducklings swimming within it, quacking happily.  To the north and
south the trail continues around the forest, against the vast grove of
trees to the east.
30829.name: {mF{Ma{Rnta{Ms{my{x - Floating in a Dream

description: The large staircase comes to this point, where a large throne
stands.  Sitting in the throne is a person that looks exactly like
you, wearing a crown and holding a scepter, commanding the most
powerful kingdom of the realms.  To the south the staircase leads back
to the vast banquet hall and farther on, the forest trail.
30828.name: {mF{Ma{Rnta{Ms{my{x - Fantasy of Power

description: The street of cobblestones travels by a large statue to the west.
The large statue is of a great warrior long forgotten by the realms,
even the plaque beneath the statue is illegible.  The only noticeable
thing upon the statue is a large symbol of Helm upon the warrior's
breastplate.  To the north and south the cobblestone streets continue
around the statue, the rain still pouring overhead.
30853.name: {wF{Wl{8a{rshb{8a{Wc{wk{9 - The Statue

description: {9  Within the lobby of this large sna{8key building, the walls and
{9ceiling shower darkness over y{8ou.  Beneath the shadows, the world
{9seems to change from confusing.. t{8o really wierd.  Fluffy bunnies and
{9slimy slugs slither here a{8nd there.  Screaming children run backwards
{9with small cats sitting atop thei{8r heads.  A pair of bananas walk by
{9to the east, peering inte{8ntly at your equipment.. wierd..{9
30876.name: {bA{Bb{Ystra{Bc{bt{9 -{8 Changing Reality

description: The light dirt path travels easily through the trees, as if it had
been there before they had fully grown.  To the north the trees seem
almost endless, while to the south the path seems to have disappeared,
only a path of clouds is there.
30836.name: {mF{Ma{Rnta{Ms{my{x - Floating Near Godhood

description: Light streams down onto the dirt path as it continues east/west
through the lush forests.  The laughter of children can be heard
echoing from throughout the trees.  Against both sides of the path the
large trees form a wall of forms, some of the trees almost seem to
resemble loved ones you once knew.  It is quite peaceful here.
30838.name: {mF{Ma{Rnta{Ms{my{x - Floating in a Dream

description: A cobblestone street ends here where a dirt path begins.  To the
east a large town stands, while to the north and south vast forests
grow.  The chirping of cheerful birds flows through the air and the
melodious singing of young maidens whispers on the wind.
30816.name: {mF{Ma{Rnta{Ms{my{x - Unconsious Choices

description: The large wooden hall comes to an abrupt end with a large circular
table in the center.  Around it sit the finest warriors of the realms,
the saviors of the people, the defeaters of Ragnarok.  Sitting in the
tallest chair, surrounded by great fighters and wizards, is a person
that looks like you, clad in platemail with a sword in your hand,
planning out the next great attack.  To the east, a large wooden
hallway spans.
30826.name: {mF{Ma{Rnta{Ms{my{x - Fantasy of Fame

description: To the north, west and south large stone walls surround you in a
dark alleyway.  Overhead the rainy sky beats down upon you, its clouds
are dark and dreary.  To the east the alleyway leads to the main road
of a town, the light glowing of streetlamps can be seen.  A large
portal stands here, against the stone wall, leading back to the
Dreaming world.
30842.name: {wF{Wl{8a{rshb{8a{Wc{wk{9 - Entering the World

description: {8The long hallway stretches north/south, its walls are made of sheer
stone that are linked together so finely that they seem almost one
large block.  To the north the shadows clear to reveal a large,
circular room..  While to the south, a small lounge can be seen.  {9
30891.name: {bA{Bb{Ystra{Bc{bt{9 -{8 Long Hallway{9

description: this is a building room.
If you're in here, fuck off.
NOTE:  REMEMBER TO MAKE WEAK OLD MAN ONCE PER REBOOT.
30800.name: Dreaming Imm Room

description: The sky overhead continues to pour down upon you, and splashes
against puddles and cobblestones on the ground.  To the west and south
the street curves around a large statue of a great warrior, long
forgotten by the people of this town.  To the north and east alleyways
branch off, the northern one leading into darkness while the eastern
one leads to a small tavern.
30856.name: {wF{Wl{8a{rshb{8a{Wc{wk{x - Before an Alley

description: You are in the middle of a large city, its buildings are mostly
homes and run-down shops.  The sky overhead crackles often with
lightning as the dark clouds rain down upon this realm.  The street is
made of cobblestone that leads to the east and west.  In a dark alley
to the west a portal can be seen, to the east the city continues.
30843.name: {wF{Wl{8a{rshb{8a{Wc{wk{9 - In a Run-Down City

description: Surrounded by cackles of mad laughter and bloody visions, this is
the pathway to the flashbacks.  Where one can come to face their past
fears or losses.  Dead bodies seem to litter the pathway as you walk,
their eyes cold and motionless through the veil of death.  To the east
a portal can be seen off in the distance.
30806.name: {DThe {rD{Rr{We{Dam{Wi{Rn{rg{x - {DPath to a {wF{Wl{Da{rshb{Da{Wc{wk{x

description: {8A long hallway stretches from north to south, its stony walls are
bare.  It's very bright here, but against the eastern wall a shadow is
formed.  Upon closer inspection, the shadow is a person..  A priest,
with its hand outstretched..  Peering at you like you owe it
something.  {9
30888.name: {bA{Bb{Ystra{Bc{bt{x - {DApproaching a Throne...{x

description: Within the tavern the air is filled with the scent of warm food and
strong ale.  A fireplace blazes in the center of the tavern, warming
your bones from the cold rain outside.  Sitting in front of the
fireplace is a wooden rocking chair where an old man sits, staring
deeply into the fire.  This man has seen much in the world, and rests
now before the fire.  To the west the doorway leads out to the cold
streets of the city.
30854.name: {wF{Wl{8a{rshb{8a{Wc{wk{x - The Warming Wisdom

description: The large dirt path travels around a large corner from south to
west through the lush forests.  Tell green trees grow vastly on both
sides of the path, and birds fly overhead.  Small animals gather food
and scamper off into the underbrush.  To the south and west the dirt
path continues through the trees.
30817.name: {mF{Ma{Rnta{Ms{my{x - Floating in a Dream

description: The large street is made of cobblestones, on both sides large
streetlamps glow lightly, their flames seem almost at the ends.  The
skies overhead are filled with dark clouds, it seems even a heaven
couldn't exist up there.  The street curves from the south to the east
around a large warehouse to the southeast, its dark brick walls seem
to stare at you as you pass.
30861.name: {wF{Wl{8a{rshb{8a{Wc{wk{x - Around the Warehouse

description: You are at the end of the cobblestone alley.  In the center a large
circle is formed on the ground in cobblestones.  Within the large
circle stands a man, his robes are made of blue silks, and he glows
lightly with an aura of good.  Around his neck is a large silver chain
attached to a large clock that lays upon his chest.  To the north the
alleyway continues on, leading to the town.
30867.name: {wF{Wl{8a{rshb{8a{Wc{wk{x - A Strange Encounter

description: A large and colorful rainbow passes in an arc over the shimmering
pathway here.  Fluffy white clouds entice your joy, and the laughter
of children echoes throughout your mind.  To the east and west the
pathway of light continues, and not far off to the west a doorway of
glimmering light can be seen.
30812.name: {DThe {rD{Rr{We{Dam{Wi{Rn{rg{x - {DPath to a {mF{Ma{Rnta{Ms{my{x

description: You walk among the clouds of the inner mind.  Visions of life and
joy flutter by, while being chased by the dreams of death and hatred.
To the north a pathway of shimmering light can be seen, travelling
over a large valley of clouds.
30801.name: {DThe {rD{Rr{We{Dam{Wi{Rn{rg{x - {DEntrance{x

description: You are within the large building made of a bright white stone.
Large desks of stone sit within it, behind each of them are merchants.
All of them looking plump, having eaten fine foods and being wealthy.
Beside each one of them is a pile of golden coins, each being guarded
closely.  To the north a hallway travels to another room, to the south
the doorway leads back to the forest path.
30821.name: {mF{Ma{Rnta{Ms{my{x - Dreams of Riches

description: Dark clouds and thunderous rumbles echo from the north, to the
south all brightens into a sort of haven compared to this place.
Lightning is seen off in the distance, and the shadowy clouds seem to
claw at you.  To the north the dark path continues into the perilous
realm, while to the south the path clears to a crossroad.
30808.name: {DThe {rD{Rr{We{Dam{Wi{Rn{rg{x - {DPath to an {bA{Bb{Ystra{Bc{bt{x

description: The cobblestone streets of the north come into this alley, the
mosaic ground is in the symbols of hourglasses and clock faces.  To
the south a tall man dressed in blue can be seen, to the north the
alleyway continues back to the main streets of the town.
30866.name: {wF{Wl{8a{rshb{8a{Wc{wk{x - Towards a Glowing Light

description: {DThis room is...  Hard to describe.  A large assortment of things
sit around the room, each seeming to invite you to enter...  But you
had best hope you don't choose wrong.  There is no indicator which is
which, and they seem to shimmer and change on occasion.  {x
30883.name: {bA{Bb{Ystra{Bc{bt{x - {gS{Gt{Wran{Gg{ge{x {bD{Bo{Wo{Br{bs{x

description: The path of light from the east ends here, and comes to a large
portal of shimmering light stands to the north.  The portal's surface
is of sparkling clear water, on the other side a world of happiness
and joy can be seen.  To the east the pathway travels off, and not too
far off a rainbow arcs over it.
30813.name: {8The {rD{Rr{We{8am{Wi{Rn{rg{9 - {mF{Ma{Rnta{Ms{my{8 Entrance{9

description: Thoughts of joy and happiness flood through this place.  Caresses
from loved ones and words of assurance and love flutter through the
air.  Visions of loved ones and friendly creatures can be seen off in
the cloudy distance.  To the west the pathway of joyful light
continues, to the east another pathway crosses this one.
30811.name: {DThe {rD{Rr{We{Dam{Wi{Rn{rg{x - {DPath to a {mF{Ma{Rnta{Ms{my{x

description: You are on the edge of a large stony cliff.  Unlike any other
cliff, this one has eyes..  That's right, it peers into the air to the
west at a small hovering tail-less rat.  It obviously wishes to speak
to the rat, by the expression it's giving, but..  It has no mouth.  To
the east a small dirt path travels through large puffy trees.
30874.name: {bA{Bb{Ystra{Bc{bt{9 -{8 A Rocky Drop

description: You are now in a large chamber made of bright stone, with a desk in
the center of it.  Behind the desk, large and expensive candles glow,
giving off aromas from far-off lands.  Sitting behind the desk is a
figure, that looks like you.  Enjoying the life of a merchant, the
most wealthy of all merchants actually.  Large bags filled to the
brims with coins litter around the desk.  To the south the doorway
leads to the main room of the merchants.
30822.name: {mF{Ma{Rnta{Ms{my{x - Fantasy of Riches

description: The large shimmering pathway travels over a large valley of white
clouds.  Light is in abundance, and fills this world with its joyful
rays.  Entrancing sounds of music can be heard off in the distance,
with intermingling sounds of pain and suffering.  To the north and
south the pathway travels off.
30802.name: {DThe {rD{Rr{We{Dam{Wi{Rn{rg{x - {DHall of Dreams{x

description: The wide cobblestone streets make an interesting design here, a
large circle with a smaller white circle within it.  And two black
lines coming from the center pointing outwards, like the hands of a
clock.  The clockhands both point southern, while the cobblestone
streets leading east turn into a light dirt path.  Off in the eastern
distance a farmouse can be seen surrounded by vast fields, while in
every other direction the wet town continues.
30850.name: {wF{Wl{8a{rshb{8a{Wc{wk{9 - A Strange Mosaic

description: This small street is covered in cobblestones, however..  The rain
overhead as ceased.  A puddle here and there is all the wetness that
can be seen.  To the south the deluge commences again and the streets
widen, to the north the doorway to a small house lays.
30862.name: {wF{Wl{8a{rshb{8a{Wc{wk{x - A Cozy Walk

description: The city's cobblestone streets run with water as the sky above
rains down.  Wooden buildings in all directions seem deserted and
run-down, like empty shells of what was once a joyous town.  To the
north and south the street curves around a large brick warehouse,
while to the west the street continues straightly.
30844.name: {wF{Wl{8a{rshb{8a{Wc{wk{9 - Curving Streetway

description: You stand in the middle of a grassy field before a white farmhouse.
The skies above are blue, but to the west dark skies can be seen.  Off
to the east a large dirt field lays, plowed neatly and ready for
seeding.  A lone figure can be seen in the middle of the field.  To
the west the grassy field turns into a dirt trail.  Far off to the
west, a large city can be seen covered with dark clouds.
30851.name: {wF{Wl{8a{rshb{8a{Wc{wk{x - Worn Wagonpath

description: {8Behind the massive throne is a small little chamber, with a couch
and some chairs.  A massive stone archway to the north leads down a
dark, shadow-infested hallway..  {9
30890.name: {bA{Bb{Ystra{Bc{bt{x - {DBehind the Throne{x

description: {8The stickiness has moved from just the floor to the walls as snails
slither all over.  The floor is slightly inclined too, becoming more
so to the north.  A few giant flies are trapped in the mucky goo,
buzzing loudly at you to help them out.  To the north the floor dips
down at a hard angle, while to the west it flattens out into a mucky
hallway.  {9
30879.name: {bA{Bb{Ystra{Bc{bt{9 -{8 Sticky Hallways

description: Surrounded by trees with a dark sky overhead, you travel a small
dirt path.  The trees on either side of the path are large, pink, and
fluffy.  Small three-legged creatures roam about here, peering at you
through dark eyes and matted fur.  To the west the edge of a large
ravine can be seen, while the entrance to a long, snaking building
lies to the north.
30875.name: {bA{Bb{Ystra{Bc{bt{9 -{8 Fluffy Trees

description: The city streets are bare and wet.  The cobblestones form lifeless
designs, travelling east and west.  To the southwest lays a large
warehouse, its brick walls as boring as the rest of this place.  To
the northeast a small street can be seen leading leading towards a
small house, its paint is bright and vibrant.
30859.name: {wF{Wl{8a{rshb{8a{Wc{wk{x - The Continuing Streets

description: An average household surrounds you, its walls are bare of any true
valuables.  Ordinary furniture fills the rooms, and no real luxuries
can be seen.  A small child sits here, peering into the southern room.
30831.name: {mF{Ma{Rnta{Ms{my{x - Dreams of Love

description: You are still floating among the clouds, but there is another form
here, one of a godly glow.  At first glance one would think it was the
great Ao, creator of the world.  However upon glancing a second time,
you notice it's you!  An immortal, one who can never die.  To the
north the clouds continue, leading back to the forest.
30841.name: {mF{Ma{Rnta{Ms{my{x - Fantasy of Godhood

description: Among the clouds, you're flying like any angel could, with the rays
of the golden sun shining upon you.  To the north the forest path can
be seen in the distance, while to the south a glowing form can be seen
hovering in the air, busy watching the world below.
30840.name: {mF{Ma{Rnta{Ms{my{x - Dreams of Godhood

description: A large portal to the south swirls with sparkling water.  Through
it the shimmering pathways of the {rD{Rr{We{8am{Wi{Rn{rg{9 can be seen.  A cobblestone
path starts here and travels to the west, through a large town.  A
large happy dog barks playfully at you.
30814.name: {mF{Ma{Rnta{Ms{my{x - Beginning of a Dream

description: You are surrounded by a large hall of white stone.  Running
north/south is a large red velvetty carpet.  On either side of the
carpet large banquet tables fill the hall, and sparkling chandeliers
hang overhead.  The hall glitters with wealth, and at the end of the
carpet a grand staircase leads up to a tall throne.  To the south the
red carpet leads to a dirt path and lush forests.
30827.name: {mF{Ma{Rnta{Ms{my{x - Dreams of Power

description: {8The hallways of the building snake around to and fro.  Echoes of
screaming children and meowing kittens fill the air as blasts of
lightning show through the skylights overhead.  The floor has turned
from a stable tile to a mucky ooze from the snails that have passed
through here.  To the north the building's floor is more stable, while
to the east it snakes on through the sticky matter.  {9
30878.name: {bA{Bb{Ystra{Bc{bt{9 -{8 Snaking Hallways

description: {8The southern hallway bursts into a large circular chamber, the
walls seem to flow into each other, creating the same sheer blocks as
the hallway's.  In the center of the room a circle marks the floor,
within it a large marble cabinet stands.  {9
30892.name: {bA{Bb{Ystra{Bc{bt{9 - {8The Circular Chamber{9

description: The rumblings of deadly thunder crash all around you, as you watch
a fluffy pink bunny cross your path toting a large bloodied knife.
Behind you a maniacal laughter sprouts here and there, while a masked
man sits atop your head.  To the north and south the pathway..  Err, a
trail of hands and feet travel.
30809.name: {DThe {rD{Rr{We{Dam{Wi{Rn{rg{x - {DPath to an {bA{Bb{Ystra{Bc{bt{x

description: The wide streets are constantly splattered with rain as the cloudy
skies overhead continue to shower upon you.  To the east and west the
street continues, illuminated by candle streetlamps on both sides.  To
the south the street becomes smaller, travelling to a small house.
30848.name: {wF{Wl{8a{rshb{8a{Wc{wk{x - A Branching Path

description: The large cobblestone street of a city can be seen to the north,
while this smaller street stretches to a small house to the south.
The street is also made of cobblestone, but the skies are clear
overhead.  To the north however, the clouded skies can be seen
pounding rain down upon the streets.
30868.name: {wF{Wl{8a{rshb{8a{Wc{wk{x - A Quaint Little House

description: You are between two large and dark buildings to the east and west.
The sky overhead seems darker and the rain seems to pound heavier than
before.  To the north the alleyway ends, but a few figures can be
seen.  To the south the alley leads back to the streets.
30864.name: {wF{Wl{8a{rshb{8a{Wc{wk{x - Deeper into Darkness

description: The light dirt path continues east/west, but is abruptly forked to
the north.  However, it is no longer dirt, but a marble floor, covered
with a large velvetty red carpet.  The carpet streams north through a
banquet hall filled with large tables and sparkling chandeliers
overhead.  To the west the trail continues on, but this time as a
large wooden hall with paintings on both sides.
30824.name: {mF{Ma{Rnta{Ms{my{x - Dreams of Fame and Power

description: The dirt path of the beautiful forest travels east/west through the
trees.  Rays of sunlight shine beautifully between the branches,
shining warmly upon you while the cool breeze cools you lightly.  The
trail continues both ways, while nearby to the southeast the trail
branches off.
30835.name: {mF{Ma{Rnta{Ms{my{x - Floating in a Dream

description: A pair of signs stand here, pointing to the east and south.  To the
north and west piles of gold and jewels sit, waiting to be pillaged.
But in your attempts at moving towards them, you are held back.  The
only ways you suppose you can go, is east and south.  But..  The piles
are definately shiny.
30872.name: {bA{Bb{Ystra{Bc{bt{9 -{8 Confusing Signs

description: You are within a small wooden house, consisting only of two rooms:
the living room which you stand in, and the kitchen to the east.  The
living room is plain with a chair and a table.  In the chair sits a
woman, her face is old with age as she has spent her whole life here.
She recounts the memories to herself, retelling every story as if it
were yesterday.  To the north the door leads out to the street from
which you came.
30869.name: {wF{Wl{8a{rshb{8a{Wc{wk{x - Lost Memories

description: The wide cobblestone streets pass east/west here, the stormy skies
overhead constantly beating down upon them.  To the east the
cobblestones form a strange mosaic of clockfaces on the ground, while
to the west the road curves off to a southern street, heading towards
a small home.
30849.name: {wF{Wl{8a{rshb{8a{Wc{wk{x - Further Down the Street

description: This room is a large kitchen, where a young person is busy cooking.
The young person looks a lot like you, busy cooking some food while,
from the doorway, another child stares in..  Staring at you with love
in their eyes.  They have obviously felt this way for a long time, and
you too feel this way about them..  That is why you are so busy in the
kitchen preparing a great dinner for them.  To the west the rest of
the house continues.
30832.name: {mF{Ma{Rnta{Ms{my{x - Fantasy of Love

description: {8A long hall of stone travels north/south, its surfaces broken and
crumbling.  On the eastern wall an expressionless stone face stares at
the opposing wall, its grim features cut by no mortal's tools.  In the
distance to the north a soft blue light glows, to the south the
hallway opens to a circular room littered with altars.  {9
30894.name: {yA C{rr{8um{yb{8lin{yg H{ra{8ll{ywa{8y{9

description: All is silent here, perhaps..  Too silent.  From the darkness all
around you, dark eyes and emotionless stares peer at you.  A large
circle of dead corpses, past foes, and family members stare.  An eerie
feeling is in the air of this circle, the portal to the north could
provide an escape, while fleeing to the west could aswell.
30807.name: {DThe {rD{Rr{We{Dam{Wi{Rn{rg{x - {wF{Wl{Da{rshb{Da{Wc{wk{x Entrance

description: {DThis room is...  Hard to describe.  A large assortment of things
sit around the room, each seeming to invite you to enter...  But you
had best hope you don't choose wrong.  There is no indicator which is
which, and they seem to shimmer and change on occasion.  {x
30882.name: {bA{Bb{Ystra{Bc{bt{x - {gS{Gt{Wran{Gg{ge{x {bD{Bo{Wo{Br{bs{x

description: The large dirt trail continues east and west, but a new path
branches off to the north.  A large building with large carts beside
it lays to the north.  The door is wide open in the front, allowing
you to enter freely.  The building is a majestic sight, truly a sign
of wealth and riches.
30820.name: {mF{Ma{Rnta{Ms{my{x - Floating Near Riches

description: You are on the edge of a ravine, to the north it is nothing but a
sheer drop of the stony face.  The skies overhead are a bright pink
color that slowly fades to blue, and back to pink again.  To the east
and west velvet ropes stop you from travelling in those directions.  A
large glowing portal stands here, speaking strange words to you.
30870.name: {bA{Bb{Ystra{Bc{bt{x - {DEdge of a Ravine{x

description: The magical pathway beneath you travels over clouded valley, light
gusts of wind send the clouds flying.  This whimsical world of is
filled with dreams of love and hatred, though their differences seem
to intertwine.  To the north the floating pathway is crossed by
another, to the south it travels over a clouded valley.
30803.name: {DThe {rD{Rr{We{Dam{Wi{Rn{rg{x - {DHall of Dreams{x

description: The dark alleyway ends abruptly with a few corpses littering the
ground.  A semicircle of bodies lays here before a figure covered in
their blood.  The people must have tried to attack the lone figure,
but they were beaten back.  Despite the victory, the last one standing
seems to be the only one angry at what happened.  Feelings of regret
are rampant here, what was done..  Should not have happened.
30865.name: {wF{Wl{8a{rshb{8a{Wc{wk{x - A Battle Won

description: The streets are made of cobblestone, placed loosely to allow the
rainwater from above to create small rivers and streams between them.
To the west the road curves around the large brick warehouse to the
north, while to the east it travels off and branches off to a street.
30846.name: {wF{Wl{8a{rshb{8a{Wc{wk{x - Against the Warehouse

description: The large dirt path travels around a large corner from north to
west through the lush forests.  Tell green trees grow vastly on both
sides of the path, and birds fly overhead.  Small animals gather food
and scamper off into the underbrush.  To the north and west the dirt
path continues through the trees.
30839.name: {mF{Ma{Rnta{Ms{my{x - Floating in a Dream

description: The wide streets travel east/west, covered in cobblestones, as the
rain pours down upon you.  The large warehouse to the north stares
ominously at you, its brick walls old and darkened by the weather.  To
the southeast the entrance to an alley can be seen.
30847.name: {wF{Wl{8a{rshb{8a{Wc{wk{x - Past the Warehouse

description: {DYou found the correct entrance!  Lucky you!  Better hope your
friends did as well...  However, very notable is a path to the north,
strange like the previous one.  {x
30887.name: {bA{Bb{Ystra{Bc{bt{x - {rW{Ro{Woh{Ro{ro!{x

description: {8Surrounded by flitting shadows and mumbling creatures, you are
within a long snaking building that leads west and south.  Fluffy
little bunny rabbits and slimy slugs travel about, leaving cotton
balls or slimy trails in their wake.  A screaming child's echoing
voice can be heard clearly as the skylight overhead fills with the
light of a lightning strike.  To the south the building continues on,
while to the west the lobby is visible.  {9
30877.name: {bA{Bb{Ystra{Bc{bt{9 -{8 Fluffy Hallways

description: You are in a large bedchamber centered with a large circular, and
comfortable, bed.  Surrounding it are men and women, all the most
beautiful in all the realms, clad scantily.  They all surround the
bed, where you lay, ready to take on any of the opposite sex that you
choose.  You are scantily dressed aswell, and have a look of sheer
pleasure upon your face as another person leaps into your bed.  To the
east a hallway of flittering silk sheets
30834.name: {mF{Ma{Rnta{Ms{my{x - Fantasy of Lust

description: The street is covered in water, creating small streams between the
cobblestones.  The dark sky overhead still pours down with droplets.
To the east and west the streets continue, lit by candled streetlamps,
while to the north a small street travels to a brightly colored house.
30858.name: {wF{Wl{8a{rshb{8a{Wc{wk{x - A Branching Street

description: The dirt path continues east/west, passing about the trees.  Birds
can be heard singing cheerful songs, and the laughter of children
echoes about.  To the north and south the trees continue for miles,
while the sunlight streams through them effortlessly.
30823.name: {mF{Ma{Rnta{Ms{my{x - Floating in a Dream

description: The wide cobblestone road takes the beating of the rain droplets as
they rain down from the sky.  The dark clouds cover the span of the
sky, blocking out all light.  The streetlamps on the sides of the
streets provide the lighting for the citizens that should be around,
but are not.  To the east and west the stony street lead past the
large southern warehouse.
30860.name: {wF{Wl{8a{rshb{8a{Wc{wk {9- Past the Warehouse

description: {8The floor has become more of a slide, and the mucky floor more
slippery.  You slide quickly and gain speed until you meet the dry
floor at the bottom quite abruptly.  The ground is flat here, but
something is not right.  In the center of the floor a creature stands,
covered in mouths..  Babbling endlessly.  {9 {9
30880.name: {bA{Bb{Ystra{Bc{bt{9 -{8 Sliding Hallways

description: You are within the small and colorful house.  The inside is just as
bright as the outside, you can see into the main living room where a
child is hunched over toys.  The child resembles you as you once were
at that age.  You are smiling and laughing as you create stories and
say them aloud.  To the south the doorway leading outside lays.
30863.name: {wF{Wl{8a{rshb{8a{Wc{wk{9 - Days of Youth

description: Light streams down onto the dirt path as it continues east/west
through the lush forests.  A young maiden's singing can be heard in
the air.  Against both sides of the path the large trees form a wall
of forms, some of the trees almost seem to resemble loved ones you
once knew.  It is quite peaceful here.
30818.name: {mF{Ma{Rnta{Ms{my{x - Floating in a Dream

description: The long cobblestone street passes through a large town, bakers and
shopkeepers come out to the street to greet you.  Everyone is waving
and greeting you.  Small children can be seen playing here, chasing
each other in a friendly game.  To the east and west are the edges of
the small town, and the portal can be seen off to the east.
30815.name: {mF{Ma{Rnta{Ms{my{x - Path in the Dream

description: The sky overhead is filled with dark clouds that rain down upon
you.  The lights from streetlamps is rampant on both sides of the
street as the large buildings loom over you.  The cobblestone street
leads from the north to the east, curving around the large warehouse
to the northeast.
30845.name: {wF{Wl{8a{rshb{8a{Wc{wk{x - A Curving Streetway

30800.room_name: An invisible dream sprite is here, granting dreams.
30800.name: a dream~

30801.room_name: A spectre floats here, waiting for something.
30801.name: a dream spectre~

30802.room_name: A fantasy floats here, trying to overwhelm your mind.
30802.name: {Da {bc{Bh{ci{Cldh{co{Bo{bd{x {mf{Ma{Rnta{Ms{my{x~

M random 30810 50~

30803.room_name: A scary looking thing has come out from under the bed.
30803.name: {Da {bc{Bh{ci{Cldh{co{Bo{bd{x {gb{Go{Dgeym{Ga{gn{x~
subroutines:
M act 30808 bites you.~
M random 30809 50~
M grall 30809 100~

description:
{8Hundreds of mouths form in the flesh of tits creature.  Where its
body begins and ends are both undeterminable.  More like a floating
mass of..  annoying.. family reunions.
 
Kinda creepy actually..{9
30805.room_name: This strange creature babbles endlessly from hundreds of mouths!
30805.name: {-a {-G{-ib{-B{-er{-IN{-g {-M{-o{-UT{-he{-R{x~

30806.name: {Da {mp{Min{mk{x {mb{Mu{Wn{Mn{my{D with a {rb{Rl{Doo{Rd{ry{x {wk{Wn{Di{Wf{we{x~

30807.room_name: {DAn {ran{Rdr{Wogy{Rno{rus{D man(?) with a {wb{Won{wy {ya{rs{ys{D blows you a kiss and winks.{x
30807.name: {Dan {ran{Rdr{Wogy{Rno{rus{D man with a {wb{Won{wy {ya{rs{ys{x~

30808.room_name: {DA snail slimes around, several flail-like growths on its head!{x
30808.name: {Da {cf{Cl{Wa{Ci{cl{x {cs{Cn{Wa{Ci{cl{x~

30809.room_name: {DThe king of the fuzzy pink bunnies is here, vorpal knife in hand.{x
30809.name: {mH{Mo{Wpsk{Mi{mp{x~

M fight 30816 100~

30810.room_name: {DThe queen of the bony-assed lecherous men is here... the hell?{x

30811.room_name: {DThe king of the Flail Snails is flailing around.{x
30811.name: {cS{Cl{Wim{Ce{cy{x~
subroutines:
M death 30861 100~
M fight 30814 50~
M exall 30819 0~

description:
This healer aids those who have slain the shadows that invade the
realms.  When given a Token of Shadows, the healer may decide to bless
you with her healing spells...
30812.room_name: {DA {Ds{Wh{wad{Wo{Dw{x {Dh{Wu{wnt{We{Dr{x {wh{We{Dal{We{wr{D is here, wanting proof of your accomplishments.{x
30812.name: {Da {Ds{Wh{wad{Wo{Dw{x {Dh{Wu{wnt{We{Dr{x {wh{We{Dal{We{wr{x~

30813.room_name: {DA helpless old man cowers here, hoping you don't hurt him.{x
30813.name: {Da {gh{Ge{Dlple{Gs{gs {Wo{yl{Wd{x {Wm{ya{Wn{x~

30814.room_name: {DThe {bA{Bb{Ystra{Bc{bt {rD{Rr{We{Da{Wm{Re{rr{D floats here, his dreams taking form.{x
30814.name: {Dthe {bA{Bb{Ystra{Bc{bt {rD{Rr{We{Da{Wm{Re{rr{x~

M fight 30824 100~
M act 30832 's death touch~

M act 30830 's freezing bite~

M act 30830 's cleave~

M act 30830 's magic~

M act 30830 's stab~

M act 30830 's slice~
M act 30830 's slash~

M act 30829 's meteor swarm~
M act 30826 bites you.~
M act 30827 sends you sprawling with a powerful~

description:
{8A fluffy little creature floats calmly over the rushing waters
below.  A pair of gossamer wings sprout from its sides, and a fuzzy
little cottonball on its bum.  The cutest little bastard you've ever
met, too bad it wants to eat your bone marrow.  {9
30815.room_name: A large {8rabbit {9of {8s{ww{Wi{wr{8l{wi{Wn{wg s{8h{wa{Wd{wo{8w{9 flies backwards, wings flapping.
30815.name: a {8s{wh{Wad{wo{8w {Wb{wu{8n{wn{Wy{9~
subroutines:
M exall 30850 4~
M exall 30850 3~
M exall 30850 2~
M exall 30850 1~
M exall 30850 0~
M grall 30849 100~

description:
{8A greasy-furred little creature floats here, his tail obviously
missing.  He gnaws furiously on his hind legs, trying to get at
something.  It peers around often, looking directly at you sometimes..
But..  Then resumes nibbling.  
 
Creepy..{9
30816.room_name: A {8tail-less {yrat{9 hovers here, {rg{Rn{8a{ww{8i{Rn{rg{9 on its hind feet.
30816.name: a {rg{Rn{8a{ww{8i{Rn{rg {yr{Ya{yt{9~
subroutines:
M grall 30849 100~
M exall 30850 0~
M exall 30850 4~
M exall 30850 3~
M exall 30850 2~
M exall 30850 1~

description:
{8A pair of signs point south and east, attached to a rigid wooden
post.  Upon closer inspection however, the signs are really
creatures..  With big teeth..  That want to eat you!  
 
{RE{rE{8e{wE{We{we{8e{rE{RE{rE{8E{we{We{wE{8e{rk{R!{9
30817.room_name: A post holds up two {6p{8o{wi{Wn{wt{8e{6d{9 signs.. with teeth.. {rg{Rr{8O{ww{Wr{wr{8R{Rr{rr{9..
30817.name: a {3set{9 of {6p{8o{wi{Wnt{wi{8n{6g{9 signs~
subroutines:
M grall 30849 100~
M exall 30850 0~
M exall 30850 4~
M exall 30850 3~
M exall 30850 2~
M exall 30850 1~

30818.room_name: {8A tall man in {mw{Mi{8s{Mp{my{8 cloaks and a steepled hat stands here..{9
30818.name: {8The {gw{Gi{8za{Gr{gd{8~
30818.keywords: wispy robed robes man dream treasure mob steepled hat tall wizard~
subroutines:
M grall 30833 100~
M speech 30835 reward~
M speech 30836 one~
M speech 30837 two~
M speech 30838 three~
M speech 30839 four~
M speech 30840 five~
M speech 30841 six~

30820.name: {Da {wg{Wu{Dardi{Wa{wn{x {ys{Yp{Wir{Yi{yt{x~
subroutines:
M act 30845 orders you to 'attune'.~
M act 30844 ! -=~

description:
{8Groups of large, strong looking trees stand on each side of the
light path.  However, instead of lush leaves, clumps of cottony pink
things litter it.  Each branch is covered in them, forming a huge
stick of cotton candy.  However, a knot-hole in the trunk, is not a
knot-hole at all..  It's a mouth..  {mE{Me{8EE{Me{mP{8!!  {9
30821.room_name: {gT{Gr{8e{Ge{gs{8 resembling {mC{Mo{8tt{Mo{mn C{Ma{8n{Md{my{8 stand on each side of the path{9
30821.name: {8A {6G{^r{8o{^u{6p{8 of {mF{Ml{8uf{Mf{my {gT{Gr{8e{Ge{gs{9~
subroutines:
M grall 30849 100~
M exall 30850 0~
M exall 30850 4~
M exall 30850 3~
M exall 30850 2~
M exall 30850 1~

30822.room_name: {DSomeone you seem to remember stands here... someone you remember fearing.{x
30822.name: {Da {ws{Wp{De{rc{Dt{Wr{we {Dfrom your {wp{Was{wt{x~

description:
{DThis large, strong... thing seems to be formed from your youthful memories,
most notably your memories of pain... memories all too clearly stamped in your
subconsious.  Every mistake you made that led to pain, every foolhardy action,
very reckless stunt you ever pulled is manifested in this thing... and it
seems to want to teach you the lessons over again... step by painful step.{x
30823.room_name: {DA thug lurks here, waiting to teach you a lesson that you never forgot...{x
30823.name: {Da {wr{We{Dc{rollect{Di{Wo{wn{D of {wp{Was{wt{x {rp{Dai{rn{x~

description:
You're immortal.  Not exactly a god, but immortal nonetheless. 
You're happily sitting there, your flesh unmarred, your health is
perfect.  You'll live forever, well..  At least until you came along..
30824.room_name: An immortal self-image of you sits among the clouds.
30824.name: {wIm{Wmo{yrta{Wli{wty{x~

description:
Filled with love and joy that your love is here, you prepare a meal
for the two of you.  Pots and pans clutter the stovetop as you stir
one while the other boils noisily.  Ahh..  True love..
30825.room_name: You're bent over a stove, cooking for the one you love.
30825.name: {rL{Rov{re{x~

description:
You're laying upon a soft bed, heart-shaped and ready to rumble. 
Surrounded by scantily clan men and women, all staring at you with a
hunger.  
 
OOC: Eww.
30826.room_name: You lay upon the soft bed, waiting for loving.
30826.name: {rL{mus{rt{x~

description:
A large stone desk looms before you, littered with bags filled with
treasures from far-off lands.  Seated behind it is a person who seems
to be counting their money, but..  This person..  Looks awfully
farmiliar.  Looks a lot like ..  You.
30827.room_name: Sitting behind a desk, you are truly a rich-looking merchant.
30827.name: {gR{Gi{Wch{Ge{gs{x~

description:
Seated high upon a throne, you wear a golden scepter and crown. 
Motes of light glisten from the golden treasures littered about you. 
Maidens pass by you, carrying food and drinks, serving you as you
wish.  Only a powerful person would have such control.
30828.room_name: You are seated on a throne, commanding a kingdom.
30828.name: {rP{Ro{Dw{Re{rr{x~

description:
You are sitting before a long wooden table.  At it are wizards and
warriors alike, each of them aged and littered with scars of battle. 
The table is worn from use, and the walls surrounding it picture great
battles fought.  The most famed warriors in all the realms.
30829.room_name: A warrior clad in platemail, seated before a table.
30829.name: {yF{Yam{ye{x~
30829.keywords: warrior fame clad platemail seated table~

description:
Towering over a bunch of toys, a child is playing.  Reciting
stories of battle and plunder, then singing small songs of happiness
and joy.  He's so caught up in it, he doesn't even notice you're
there.
30830.room_name: A small child plays with his toys.
30830.name: {yM{Ye{gmori{Ye{ys{x~

description:
A man stands before a semicircle of bodies.  Three of them before
him and one to his left side.  The man's hands are covered in blood,
and his face with tears.  They must have been thugs or murderers of
some kind, but..  They didn't deserve to die..  Did they?
30831.room_name: A man stands over a semicircle of bodies.
30831.name: {bR{Be{Wgre{Bt{bs{x~
30831.keywords: regrets man standing stands semi circle semicircle bodies~

description:
A cloaked man sits before the blazing fireplace, his eyes filled
with wonder and mystery.  He tells tales to the children of the city,
their mouths often open in awe.  Tales of battle and victory, love and
sorrow.  A truly wise man.  He has seen much in this world.
30832.room_name: A cloaked old man sits before the fireplace.
30832.name: {bW{Bi{Wsd{Bo{bm{x~
30832.keywords: wisdom old man cloaked sits sitting fireplace~

description:
A farmer can be seen off in the distance, a hat covering his head
as he wipes his brow from the work.  His hand often dips his hand into
a large sack, and pulls from it a handful of seeds that he lets fly
over the freshly plowed land.  An old man yes, a stupid old farmer? 
No..
30833.room_name: An old farmer stands in a field, sowing seeds.
30833.name: {rN{Ro{Ys{Wtal{Yg{Ri{ra{x~
30833.keywords: nostalgia old farmer stands standing field sowing sows seeds~

description:
A strange looking fellow stands in the center of a large
cobblestone clock.  Though unmoving, the stones seem to tell the time
of the realms.  The man is dressed in silken robes, and smiles as you
arrive.  Upon his chest is a large clock that ticks noisily of the
current time.  Often he peers at it, adjusts it, then places it back
on his chest..
30834.room_name: A short man dressed in silken robes tells time.
30834.name: {wT{Wim{we{x~
30834.keywords: time short man silen robes tells telling~

description:
An old woman sits in a chair.  She mumbles to herself frequently
and sometimes looks up at you to tell you a few things.  When she
speaks to you, the words don't seem to make sense, then she looks back
down at the table again.  She's speaking of her life..  Your life.. 
Memories..
30835.room_name: An old woman sits at a table in a wooden chair.
30835.name: {wA{yg{we{x~
30835.keywords: age old woman sitting sit seated table wooden chair~

30836.room_name: {DA little boy stands here, bouncing a ball.{x
30836.name: a little boy~

description:
He looks like a slacker, with torn pants and a dirtied shirt.  In
some nostalgic way, he seems very familiar--as if reminiscent of a
person from your past...
30837.room_name: {DAn apathetic teenager wanders aimlessly, not caring about anything.{x
30837.name: an apathetic teenager~

30838.room_name: {DAn abstract concept floats here, unproven yet theoretically possible.{x
30838.name: an abstract concept~

30839.room_name: {DA dark form envelops you, sharp blades and needles forming and fading from the shadow.{x
30839.name: {Da tormenting nightmare{x~
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK
M random 30882 5~

30840.name: testshop~
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK
M speech 30883 switch~

description:
MOB NOTES: Should be invisible to mortals. Has mprog to trigger on a login event...a short
delay and then a force vis, nonlethal damage, then a transfer to the nightmare room in
abstract. Is here to combat the growing habit of LOGGING OUT IN A HERO RUN AREA. Questions,
concerns, or comments should be noted to Michelson on '62 or Dugmaren on '60.  Thank you!
-Mich
